nodes.text: Coronet Durasteel was a company represented by an official in Coronet Spaceport on  Corellia. When the planet was invaded by the reconstituted Sith Empire, Coronet Durasteel was quick to ally itself with the Sith.

Other Corellian companies did not yield to the Empire, however, and despite Coronet Durasteel's efforts to persuade them otherwise in a bid to appease their Imperial overseers, companies such as Czerka Corellia, the Corellian Engineering Corporation, and Corellia StarDrive did not fall to Imperial persuasion until resistance was crushed by Imperial forces coordinated by Darth Charnus, the apprentice of Darth Decimus, who was leader of the Imperial occupation.
Coronet Durasteel was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic. The company shares its name with Coronet Spaceport and City, as well as durasteel, a material used to produce armor.
